parameters.name: AttributeDef
parameters.description: Attribute definition that you are looking for on this component

parameters.name: WhichOne
parameters.description: Index number of the attribute that you want to return; there might be several attributes on this component

title: IComponent2.FindAttribute
description: Finds an attribute on a component.
signature:
System.Object FindAttribute( 
   System.Object
AttributeDef
,
   System.Int32
WhichOne
)

parameters.description: Index number of the attribute that you want to return; there might be several attributes on this component
